org.deeplearning4j.nearestneighbor.client

Class NearestNeighborsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nearestneighbor.client.NearestNeighborsClient

  • public class NearestNeighborsClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client for the nearest neighbors server. To create a client, pass in a host port combination with the following format: http://host:port

                                   int k)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Runs knn on the given index with the given k (note that this is for data already within the existing dataset not new data)
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the EXISTING ndarray to run a search on
        k - the number of results
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • knnNew

        public NearestNeighborsResults knnNew(int k,
                                      INDArray arr)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Run a k nearest neighbors search on a NEW data point
        Parameters:
        k - the number of results to retrieve
        arr - the array to run the search on. Note that this must be a row vector
        Returns:
        Throws:
